summary: I've been working in academic and professional R&D environments for over 10 years doing statistical analyses.  I am particularly skilled in medical image analysis and big data - with my main focus being on machine learning.

company.name: Research Center for Molecular and Cellular Imaging (RCMCI)

profile_positions.company: Research Center for Molecular and Cellular Imaging (RCMCI)
profile_positions.description:
•	Improving machine learning product on different medical imaging protocols such as multi-parametric MRI and CT for distinguishing tissue sub-regions %of brain gliomas
•	Using machine learning techniques on imaging biomarkers for predicting the histopathologically proven glioma tissue sub-regions
•	Designing algorithms for detecting the optimal number of clusters based on geometry of objects
•	Designing algorithms based on tumor shapes for diagnosing malignant tumors
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

•	‎Development of a Computer-aided Diagnostic Method Using Multi parametric Magnetic Resonance ‎Imaging in Breast Cancers
